name: The Right Side
description:
This game was made for #GeoJam2022 in three days.

Each edge must contact the platform of the same color as its own color . You must choose the right side!

- W or UpArrow for jump

- Q and E for rotate the cube (Note : If you are grounded you can't rotate . You have to be in the air )

Music --> https://soundcloud.com/marvel83/lost-highway-1
